title: 362. Why Is This Man Running for President?
description: In the American Dream sweepstakes, Andrew Yang was a pretty big winner. But for every winner, he came to realize, there are thousands upon thousands of losers — a “war on normal people,” he calls it. Here’s what he plans to do about it.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
